text: geunyeoga bunman-eul hagoseo malha gil juyeo jeoneun yeoja aileul bunmanhayeossnaida hananim-eun geunyeoga bunmanhangeos-eul jal asinoda namjaga yeojawa gatji anihani geunyeoui ileum-eul ma liala hayeossnaida geunyeowa geunyeo ui jason-eul satan-eulobuteo bohohal geos-eul myeonglyeonghayeossnola
